kodkod.engine.bool

Class BooleanFormula

  • java.lang.Object
    • kodkod.engine.bool.BooleanValue
      • kodkod.engine.bool.BooleanFormula
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<BooleanValue>, Iterable<BooleanFormula>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanVariable, ITEGate, MultiGate, NotGate

    public abstract class BooleanFormula
extends BooleanValue
implements Iterable<BooleanFormula>
    A non-constant boolean value with zero or more inputs.
    Author:
    Emina Torlak
    Specfields:
    op: Operator
    size: int
    inputs: [0..size) -> one BooleanFormula
    Invariants:
    size >= 0
